alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:28PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Blaine County through 415 PM MDT... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 17 miles northwest of Hays, or 24 miles northwest of Zortman, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects and localized flooding is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Blaine County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
